Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to permissible employment, employment related activities, and volunteer activities that may be performed by convicted sex offenders
Summary: Relates to permissible employment, employment related activities, and volunteer activities that may be performed by convicted sex offenders; prohibits sex offenders from working on vehicles that sell frozen desserts and from working at a facility where they have unsupervised access to residential living quarters.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to permissible employment, employment related activities, and volunteer activities that may be performed by convicted sex offenders
